articles.author: Toyin Owoseje, CNN
articles.title: Technoblade, Minecraft YouTuber watched by millions, dead at 23
articles.description: Minecraft YouTuber Technoblade has died at the age of 23 following a year-long battle with cancer, his family announced Friday.

articles.title: Video: Symbol of Ukrainian resistance at center of new dispute - CNN Video
articles.description: Snake Island, a symbol of Ukrainian resistance, is back in the headlines as both Ukraine and Russia make different claims on why Russian troops withdrew from the island. CNN's Scott McLean reports.

articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Russian missile strikes on Odesa kill 20, including a child, after housing block hit overnight
articles.description: At least 20 people, including a child, were killed when Russia launched overnight missile strikes at a residential building and a recreation center near Odesa, southern Ukraine, officials said on Friday.

articles.title: Visualizing the inequality of abortion access in a post-Roe America
articles.description: In a post-Roe America, 112 million residents face at least a 3.5 hour drive to the nearest abortion clinic, according to a CNN analysis. Here's who will be most affected and what access looks like in your state.

articles.author: Opinion by Sam Kiley, CNN
articles.title: Opinion: Don't be fooled by Boris Johnson's backing of Ukraine
articles.description: With two visits to Kyiv under his belt and strong words of support for Ukraine's bid to defeat Putin, there is one topic strikingly missing from British Prime Minister Boris Johnson's rhetoric -- the EU, writes Sam Kiley.
articles.content:

articles.title: Analysis: The force of Supreme Court's right turn has shaken the country
articles.description: The Supreme Court reached into every corner of American life, reordering intimate family choices, breaching the separation of church and state, and diminishing the steps government can take to prevent gun violence or protect the environment.

articles.title: Recent attacks on pro-Russian officials in southern Ukraine indicate signs of growing resistance movement

articles.title: Live updates: Russia's war in Ukraine

articles.title: Treasury blocks $1 billion in Delaware trust tied to Russian oligarch
